title: ‘Bachie’ Sweetheart Elly Miles Opens Up About Body Confidence Journey On Instagram
text:
‘Bachie’ sweetheart Elly Miles has opened up about her body confidence issues in a recent Instagram post.

The 25-year-old was a fan favourite in Matt Agnew’s season of ‘The Bachelor’, and despite not winning his heart, she sure won ours.

Elly, who works as a nurse when she’s not winning hearts, shared two bikini photos from different days to demonstrate how completely normal it is to feel and look different depending on the day. One photo depicted Elly feeling “toned and fabulous”, while the other showed her feeling “bloated and fluffy.”

“I was feeling all kinds of sad and would look in the mirror and put myself down. It’s so important to love the skin your in – at all stages of life!” She said in the long Instagram post.

Although Elly is clearly a beautiful girl in both photos, her message is so important, especially for her younger fans.

“It’s very easy in today’s society to get wrapped up in how your body should look & compare yourself to others.”

The post has amassed over 18,000 likes and a plethora of comments in support of her and her message.

Elly shared how she has changed her personal mindset when it comes to her body by setting realistic, achievable goals for herself and “owning” her body. She went on to explain how her new mindset has changed her “whole outlook on life.”
description: 'The Bachelor' fan favourite Elly Miles has opened up about her struggles with body image and positivity in a recent candid Instagram post.
